name: Ring of Basilius
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

descriptions.name: Basilius Aura
descriptions.description: Grants 0.65 mana regeneration and 2 armor in a 900 radius.

notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
